price: Katika sura yoyote aliyo ipenda akakujenga.
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
footnotes: Akakujenga na akakuleta katika sura yoyote aliyo itaka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
